metadata.title: CVE-2019-15917 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 5.0.5. There is ause-after-free issue when hci_uart_register_dev() fails inhci_uart_set_proto() in drivers/bluetooth/hci_ldisc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15917` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.2.0-16-generic - 4.2.0-16.19
